SELECT SEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,ID,REGDATE,READCOUNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT SEQ,TITLE,ID,REGDATE,READCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,SEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,ID,REGDATE,READCOUNT FROM (SELECT SEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,ID,REGDATE, READCOUNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD ORDER BY SEQ)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{last} AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
